weight increment linear search for scatter tabl a new linearsearch for hash tabl whose increment step is a functionof the kei be address is present comparison with knownmethod ar given in term of effici and comput complexin particular the new method appli to tabl of sizen 2 r it allow full tabl search and practicelimin primari cluster at a veri low cost cacm decemb1972 luccio f linear search weight increment search scatter storaghash tabl kei hash address cluster search length 3 733 74 4 9 ca721204 jb januari 27 1978 1125 am 1676 4 2251 1682 4 2251 1728 42251 1860 4 2251 1860 4 2251 1973 4 22511973 4 2251 1973 4 2251 1973 4 2251 19924 2251 1992 4 2251 2018 4 2251 2018 42251 2018 4 2251 2032 4 2251 2033 4 22512033 4 2251 2107 4 2251 2107 4 2251 21094 2251 2109 4 2251 2138 4 2251 2203 42251 2203 4 2251 2203 4 2251 2203 4 22512251 4 2251 2251 4 2251 2251 4 2251 22514 2251 2251 4 2251 2251 4 2251 2359 42251 2524 4 2251 2530 4 2251 2534 4 22512537 4 2251 2543 4 2251 2543 4 2251 25434 2251 2543 4 2251 2543 4 2251 2552 42251 2559 4 2251 2559 4 2251 2559 4 22512573 4 2251 2573 4 2251 2573 4 2251 27704 2251 2770 4 2251 2770 4 2251 2770 42251 2974 4 2251 2991 4 2251 2991 4 22513053 4 2251 3053 4 2251 3053 4 2251 30534 2251 3083 4 2251 3083 4 2251 1785 52251 1786 5 2251 1973 5 2251 2018 5 22512107 5 2251 2109 5 2251 2251 5 2251 22515 2251 2251 5 2251 2974 5 2251 2109 62251 2251 6 2251
